TEXT.S: Al Alvarez sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA kawas tay 1912 , ryax sa tay 5 nqu tay 10, Al Alvarez, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 1995) qnxan nya(qyanux nya) Al Alvarez htagan beh sa luntung. yaba ru yaya ga kahul qutix 'ubuy na yotay. sraral ga mqwas biru beh hanpust't' huo( Hall Hampstead) ru mqwas biru beh Oundle ru Corpus Christi College,Oxfoed. hiya ga wal magal ego te qutux lalu.suru lga,magal hopa pqwasan biru semong kengkyu. Al Alvarez cyux maki Nyocin ru Amelika pcbaq biru.trang pusan kawas(20 kawas) m'semong Censyome. hiya ga te sazing kneril nya,cyux maki sazing laqi Luke ru kate.
